divs: Sighting Detailsi was in the bus heading to presidio tx.on hwy. 67 so.when i saw this object like cristal made in the mountains of marfa area.i have time to capture 2 pictures of the object...i had too many experiencies of this type in del rio tx.long time ago,i remember at least 7 times i saw ufos,at very close range,even an alien at 10 ft. away from me,i know this is very difficult to belive so i keep this away from people who don't belive me,but i have witnesses who saw same ufos with me in diferent years from 1955 to present days... in the del rio area is very commun watching those ufos...in the marfa area is very famous because the lights at nights, but this time was at 3;pm so i took this pics with my cell,and i think it was a ufo camuflaged in the ski,the ufos can be camuflaged in the skies and clouds also,or desapear completly...
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Marfa
There were no other sightings in Marfa on or around February 21st 2011
